The switch is initially open and the capacitor is initially uncharged. The following process then occurs:

At time <math alttext="t equals 0" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>, the switch is closed.

At time <math alttext="t sub 1" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>, the circuit has reached steady state.

At time <math alttext="t sub 2" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>, the switch is reopened.
